title: Mr G is always on beat
text: Mr G is always on beat Monday, 26 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) LIKE Beyonce, Mr G is always on beat. Chris Lilley has posted a video mashup of his drama teacher alter-ego and Drake’s Hotline Bling . Ronda Rousey Used to Fight For Frappucinos 00:43 Ronda Rousey gets paid the big bucks these days for kicking the rear ends of her opponents, but it wasn't always that way.
